name: Tomasz Lee

Strong problem-solving abilities and algorithmic thinking, combined with effective communication skills in English, enable seamless collaboration and leadership within cross-functional teams. Adept at leveraging both frontend and backend technologies, including **ReactJS** and **NextJS**, to deliver high-performance solutions.
